Text: Invest in your Futurepst Have Your Downline Built Before You Spend Any Money This program offers a Monthly Guaranteed Minimum Income Guaranteed Downline Guaranteed Income A REAL OPPORTUNITY Get the Support Tools and training to succeed Its FREE to join our Post Launch Program Your FREE membership will also be entered into a lucky drawing to WIN to shop online ALL new members who join after you will be placed in ONE Straight Line down UNDER you in a month You can easily get members under YOU in a month It is happening EVERY MONTH There is NO RISK to get involved and NO COST to join our Post Launch TO SIGN UP Simply Reply to IMPORTANT Put in the Subject Line Send My FREE Membership required Place in the letter content Your First and Last name required Add your Email address if different from the current one All information comes with your FREE membership We will confirm your position and send you your Member Number along with a special report You have nothing to lose and potentially a lot to gain JOIN TODAY To be removed
